name: EufyHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen light.”
”Alexa, set Bedroom light to 20%.”
”Alexa, make Living Room warmer.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The EufyHome Skill is a Smart Home Skill provided by Anker. With the EufyHome Skill and Alexa, you can interact with your Eufy light bulbs, strip lights, and smart plugs. To get started, select the “Enable Skill” button in the Alexa app to link your EufyHome account and say “Alexa, discover devices” or through the Smart Home session from the Alexa app to discover new devices.

Before using this skill, you will need to know the name of the device you want to control. You can rename the device by following the two methods listed below：
 -Use the name(s) you set up already in the EufyHome app - these are shown in the EufyHome app and can be modified.
 -Create an Alexa group, like Living Room or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. For more information, please visit http://amzn.to/2965dCE. 

Once you know the name or group of your device(s), here are some of our favorite phrases to get started with:

Turn On/Off Device:

 -Alexa, turn on the Kitchen Room light
 -Alexa, turn off the Christmas tree lights.

Adjust brightness (Only for light bulbs and strip lights):

 -Alexa, set the kitchen light to 20%.
 -Alexa, increase bathroom by 30%.
 -Alexa, increase living room.
 -Alexa, dim children room.

Change White Color (Only for light bulbs that can change color temperature):

 -Alexa, set the bedroom light to soft white.
 -Alexa, make reading room cooler.

If you have any questions about EufyHome Skills, please contact Eufy Suppport: 1-800-988-7973 (US) Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (PST)
